site.name: Maitri Gada
site.hero_headline: I build reliable AI & SWE systems that ship.
site.hero_subheadline: Knowledge-graph RAG, canary A/B infra, and multimodal ML — with an obsession for readability, testability, and speed.

seo.default_description: Portfolio of Maitri Gada — AI/SWE generalist: RAG systems, experimentation infra, multimodal ML.

pages.index.html: AI engineer and SWE generalist who ships user-facing systems with measurable impact.
pages.projects.html: Selected work: RAG, canary testing for recommender systems, Fiddler Guardrails, Mini-LLaMA, and more.
pages.resume.html: Experience, projects, and achievements of Maitri Gada.
pages.education.html: CMU MSAII — coursework, degrees, and academic highlights.
pages.work.html: Work history and impact in AI & software engineering.

projects.title: Vet Copilot — Knowledge-Graph RAG for Prescription Review
projects.summary: Built a Neptune-backed entity graph and retrieval pipelines, then wired LLM reasoning to cut cognitive load for Rx checks. Added caching & guards for latency and safety.
projects.impact: Review time ↓ ~45% in internal demo flows; hallucination checks via rule-based guardrails.
projects.details: Problem → scattered Rx policies. **Solution:** KG-first RAG (entities: drug, species, diagnosis) + retrieval templates; added prompt-level guardrails and caching.

projects.title: Movie Recs — Canary A/B Infra with 10% Traffic
projects.summary: Production-style dual-model routing (main vs canary), structured logging, ETL, and evaluator to compute RMSE/MAE per model with Welch’s t-test for promotion decisions.
projects.impact: De-risked releases; repeatable evaluation with clear uplifts.

projects.title: Fiddler Guardrails for Alt-Text Safety
projects.summary: Moderated Azure CV alt-text and user captions before display using Fiddler `ftl-safety` with a trigger-warning UX.
projects.impact: Flagged unsafe/misleading captions; smoother trust & safety review.

projects.title: Cadence — Smart Collar ML (Multimodal Dog Wellness)
projects.summary: Fused IMU + audio to detect stress/fatigue; transformer sequence models and CNN-based sound classifiers.
projects.impact: Early signals of stress events; foundation for owner & vet insights.

projects.title: Mini-LLaMA (11-711) — Compact LLM Implementation
projects.summary: Implemented attention, RoPE, optimizations; used for generation and zero-/fine-tuned classification tasks.
projects.impact: Lean training loop; 40% faster processing vs baseline in class setting.

projects.title: RAG for CMU & Pittsburgh Q&A
projects.summary: Scraped domain data, annotated Q/A, evaluated variants (Mistral-7B best with concise prompt tuning).
projects.impact: Best hit rate with short, concrete answers.

projects.title: ContextLegalBias — Reproduction & Debugging
projects.summary: Reproduced LCD/GAP results on BEC-Cri/Pro; investigated divergences in μ_female/μ_male/Δ scoring.
projects.impact: Pinpointed metric mismatches; documented reproducible pipeline.

projects.title: ASR Trainer & Progressive Curriculum
projects.summary: Decoder-only transformer with CE+CTC, progressive layer unfreezing, mixed precision, beam search, attention logging.
projects.impact: Modular trainer used across labs; clear ablation hooks.

bullets: Built knowledge-graph RAG prototype (Neptune + LangChain) for Rx review; added latency caching and guardrails.
Partnered with PM/Vets to encode policies as entities and relationship edges.
Delivered internal demo with measurable review-time reduction.
Shipped farmer companion app with task tracking and personalized recs.
Cut fertilizer/pesticide use by ~35% and improved labor productivity by ~20%.
Owned data model, analytics, and feature rollout cadence.
Implemented OCR flows and desktop GUI utilities for internal users.
Automated repetitive checks; reduced manual QA effort.
Authored product roadmap for a fractional investment platform.
Supported early GTM research and feature prioritization.

degrees.notes: QPA: 4.0 (first term); focus on GenAI, RecSys, RAG, and ML Systems.

planned: Independent Study/Capstone: RAG + KG at scale
